newsitem.title: USA: Energen buys Amoco's coalbed methane.
newsitem.headline: Energen buys Amoco's coalbed methane.

text.p: Energen Corp said Friday its oil and gas exploration and production subsidiary, Taurus Exploration Inc, has completed its purchase of Amoco Corp's Black Warrior Basin coalbed methane properties for $72 million.

The planned transaction, announced July 9, includes more than 260 producing wells and estimated net proved reserves of 90 billion cubic feet. Substantially all of the reserves are classified as proved producing.
Net annual production from the Amoco wells currently exceeds 7 billion cubic feet.

Through the year 2002, production from all of the wells qualifies for the nonconventional fuels tax credit, which presently is valued at just over $1 per thousand cubic feet of production and increases annually with inflation.
